Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Nabiyow kassis, Yallih naqboytit girá fan maagowsinta ayró naharsi mara keenik hirriigâ maral hooriyta Malayka

Usun jahannam giráh amoh yamaateeniih, sinni umaaneená yangadden waqdi, ken maabbaay (aytiita kinnuk), ken mabulwaay (Gntiita kinnuk), ken arooba (xagar kinnuk) keenil sumaaqitta addunyal abak sugen uma taamoomil

Kaadu Yallih naqboytit sinni aroobak (xagar kinnuk) macah nel sumaaqittaanaah iyyan. Ummaanim yaabisa Yalli nee yaabisa keenik itta ken arooba. Kaadu naharsi adda sin gintem kaa kinniih kaa fan gacsimtan rabteeniik lakal
Kaadu sinni qellisak masuginniton umaané abtan waqdi sin maabbaay, sin mabulwaay, sin arooba siinil sumaaqittaamih meesih, kinnih immay diggah Yalli abba haytaanamak maggom aaxige waam akkaluk sugten
Kaadu woh sin uma dareemuy sin bayiseeh, girá sin culsey sinni Rabbi edde daremteeni kinni, tokkel baxaysite marah maacissen
Tokkel digaalál coolaysiteenik (yisbireenik) girá keenik orbeynaay, toobah addunyâ madaara essereenik, usun woh kak oggolan mara hinnon keenik iyya Yalli

Kaadu keenih massosneh uma kataysiisiy addunyal uma taamá qaxa keenit bahsissey akeera ken hawweenisse, kaadu digaalâ maxcó keenil nımmatteeh madqimteh keenik naharat warrayte ummattâ luk ginni koros kee seehadâ korosuk. Diggah usun baxaysiteeh kasaarite marah sugen
